title: What purpose do paper clips serve? - Quora

response.answer_text: Aside from temporarily holding a few sheets, not necessarily something you want stapled, together? Pretty much anything you could do with a piece of hard wire. Small reinforcements, makeshift tool for fixing stuff, pushing the “reset” button on stuff, make some sort of spring or simple mechanism/toy, smartphone stand, tabletop cable holder, maybe lock picking, makeshift clip for whatever you want to attach to you (an NFC tag, for example)? I'm out of ideas.
